/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly in the top right corner, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's hustle and bustle.
